Name: TheNightfall
About the game: TheNighfall Victoria moves with her family to a new city to start her new job. But the first night in her new house is completely different than expected. As her husband and their two children are coming a day later she has to stay the first night alone in their new house. What starts with insomnia and a slight malaise first becomes an absolute nightmare during the night. Will you be able to survive this night until dawn? Features Atmospheric horror experience of a special kind Thrilling story-line Breathtaking soundscape Realistic and detailed graphics Interactive surrounding Original music by Northpolyptica
